answers.answer: Do you have a question? You really need to give more information. Are you a Type 1 diabetic? Are you concerned that you might have diabetes? Random blood sugars don't mean much. You should test fasting blood sugar (normal is under 100, pre-diabetes 100-125 and diabetes 126 and over) and two hours after eating at which point you want to be under 140.

question: random blood sugar is in position up and down
title: sugar up and down
